node.text: Discover our new collection: Showtime. Impeccably designed, luxurious pieces made to elevate your everyday and finished with exquisite details you'll want to wear uncovered. Crafted from soft stretch tulle with intricate jacquard lace and beautiful Puntina embroidery, it's the perfect blend of beauty and function. #MyLifeinLaPerla

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by La Perla on July 14, 2021 tagging @homehouselondon. May be an image of 1 person and indoor.

node.text: Introducing our new Showtime balconette bra, designed to enhance curves, subtly lift and create a strong, seductive silhouette. Inspired by everyday romance and the freedom to move in fabrics that make you feel at your best. #MyLifeinLaPerla

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by La Perla on July 13, 2021 tagging @homehouselondon. May be an image of one or more people.

node.text: Sensual, exquisite and irresistibly alluring, our most-wanted Showtime bodysuit is back in stock. Designed for ultimate comfort and beauty combined,  it's cut from soft stretch tulle with intricate jacquard lace and Puntina embroidery detailing. Perfect layered under plunging necklines or worn on its own. #MyLifeinLaPerla

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by La Perla on July 11, 2021 tagging @sarabarilla. May be an image of 1 person, standing and body of water.

node.text: @SaraBarilla soaks-up the Italian sun wearing our new Audition swimsuit. #InLaPerla

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by La Perla on July 10, 2021 tagging @homehouselondon. May be an image of 1 person.

node.text: Introducing the Exotique bra; irresistible, impeccably crafted and designed to inspire, uplift and empower as soon as you slip it on. Combining beauty and function, it's the ultimate luxury, everyday lingerie, made with soft silk and light-as-air Leavers lace. #MyLifeinLaPerla

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by La Perla on July 09, 2021. May be an image of one or more people.

node.text: This is La Perla in the 1970s. Powerful shapes mixed with playful details, cool, colourful - and always impeccably crafted. Swimwear designed for strong women who wanted to express themselves, and look and feel irresistibly good in the process. Captured by Marco Emili. #LaPerla
